alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Cumberland; Durham; Harnett; Johnston; Lee; Sampson; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 6:51AM EST until January 03 at 7:30AM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sampson County in central North Carolina... Harnett County in central North Carolina... Cumberland County in central North Carolina... Lee County in central North Carolina... Wake County in central North Carolina... Western Johnston County in central North Carolina... Chatham County in central North Carolina... Southern Durham County in central North Carolina... * Until 730 AM EST. * At 651 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Goldston to near Robeson Community College, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Fayetteville, Cary, Sanford, Clinton, Pittsboro, Lillington, Fort Bragg and Garner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Chatham; Cumberland; Durham; Harnett; Johnston; Lee; Sampson; Wake
